title: [其他]WeatherGUI —— 使用GUI面板来更改天气！[1.8]
author: 小鱼123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小鱼123 于 2018-2-5 11:49 编辑 

使用GUI来更改天气!Change the weather with a gui!





× 说明 ×× Descirption ×
>使用漂亮的GUI来改变天气你当前世界>在更改天气时包括一些很赞的音效>Change the weather of your current world using a beautiful gui> Include some sounds for a very nice acting quality


 × 指令 ×× Commands×
> /weather | /w



 × 权限 ×× Permissions ×
> weathergui.use - 使用天气GUI的权限> weathergui.use.sunny - 将天气切换至晴天的权限> weathergui.use.rainy - 将天气切换至雨天的权限> weathergui.use.stormy - 将天气切换至暴风雨的权限
> weathergui.use - to use this weather gui> weathergui.use.sunny - to change weather to sunny> weathergui.use.rainy - to change weather to rainy> weathergui.use.stormy - to change weather to stormy



 × 相册 ×× Galery × 
点击 这里来查看它长得什么样子!Click hereto see how it actually looks like!（注：相册跳转至原帖）
